attributes.review: I cannot believe this.!! I downloaded this app... wanted to see it and prove these reviews wrong. But they’re all right !!!!!!!!! This is so sad 😔 the moment this app was on my phone my $400 million mansion exploded! 🔥🔥😮😵💥 I was sent flying through the air I think I saw the ISS 🛰 and when I landed (safely) I realized someone had caught me 🥰 omg but who was it 🤔 OH NO it was Justin Bieber 😖 I ran away as fast as I could to see my mansion in FLAMES I was so sad my pet plastic spoon named Johnathon Thaddius Matthias Bob Rebecca Jr. III was still in there!! We have to save him! So I got Justin Bieber 🦦 and he said he would help save my spoon and we went in there and WHAT?!?! ALEX TREBEK HAD MY SPOON!! 🥄GIVE IT BACK I YELLED AND HE SAID WHAT?!?! And then I went oh sorry what is give me back my spoon so he did thankfully and Justin Bieber and I saved the day!!! Mel B gave us an award but I will never emotionally recover from the trauma this app has unleashed upon me... 😭😭😭 then I decided I must delete this app!! I did and my house was back to normal! So then I decided I could use this to my advantage and I went to my ex’s house and downloaded the app then guess what? WHAT?? It exploded!!!! 🦚🦚🦚 I exploded so many houses I accidentally completely obliterated the entire ozone layer after committing thousands war crimes with this power 😳 I was sent to jail in solitary confinement for three years 😡🤯🤭 I destroyed every government building in every nation and the world went into complete anarchy so I stole my free PS5 but that’s the only good thing that came out of this app thank you for reading TAKE THIS AS A WARNING ⚠️
